name: Miles & Kilo
description: After their plane is downed by a mischievous specter, Miles and Kilo must find a way to escape a haunted archipelago. Help them run, jump, surf, swing, and slide their way through 36 levels in this fast-paced retro platformer.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.0 GHz dual-core processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 Storage: 200 MB available space
